name: cy_research
description: This is a research of cypress, also this project will be used to give demo of cypress

scripts.cy:UI:chrome:dash: npx cypress run --headed --browser chrome --spec cypress/e2e/tests/saucedemo --record --key a3f9ef92-08b5-469a-b482-9d21ec4c7c83
scripts.cy:API:chrome:dash: npx cypress run --headed --browser chrome --spec cypress/e2e/tests/api --record --key a3f9ef92-08b5-469a-b482-9d21ec4c7c83
scripts.cy:UI:edge:dash: npx cypress run --headed --browser edge --spec cypress/e2e/tests/saucedemo --record --key a3f9ef92-08b5-469a-b482-9d21ec4c7c83
scripts.cy:API:edge:dash: npx cypress run --headed --browser edge --spec cypress/e2e/tests/api --record --key a3f9ef92-08b5-469a-b482-9d21ec4c7c83

author: Marcela Lopez
